Package menu

Interface MenuInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
GameOverMenu, InstructionsMenu, LeaderboardMenu, Menu, PauseMenu, ShopMenu, StartMenu, VictoryMenu
public interface MenuInterface
Menu interface generate various types of menus.
Author:
Eduardo Correia, Alberto Serra, JosÃ© Carvalho

    • iterateSelection

      void iterateSelection​(int iterator)
      Iterates the value of the selected button. This is used to change which button is selected.
      Parameters:
      iterator - value to sum to currently selected button.

    • select

      void select()
      Executes the currently selected button.

    • splitText

      void splitText​(String separator, int xIncr, int yIncr)
      Splits the text on the text string and adds them to the texts list. This method is used to facilitate writing long texts on the menu
      Parameters:
      separator - separator to split the text on
      xIncr - x coordinate increment for the text
      yIncr - y coordinate increment for the text

    • buttonDraw

      void buttonDraw​(int counter, com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.TextGraphics textgraphics)
      Draws the buttons present on the menu. Selected buttons appear with a different colour.
      Parameters:
      counter - index of currently selected button
      textgraphics - lanterna textgraphics screen to draw buttons on

    • textMenuElementDraw

      void textMenuElementDraw​(com.googlecode.lanterna.graphics.TextGraphics textgraphics)
      Draws all the text menu elements in the lanterna textgraphics screen.
      Parameters:
      textgraphics - lanterna textgraphics screen to draw text on

    • draw

      void draw()
      Draws the instantiated menu onto the screen.
